# ArrayExpress metadata creation from **sdrf** file

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
annot_mat <- read.table("./E-MTAB-3929.sdrf.txt", sep = "\t", header = TRUE, row.names = 1)
```

```{r}
print(colnames(annot_mat))
```
```{r}
targets <- data.frame(
  run_accession = annot_mat$Comment.ENA_RUN.,
  development_stage = annot_mat$Characteristics.developmental.stage.,
  cell_type = annot_mat$Characteristics.individual.,
  assay_extract = annot_mat$Extract.Name
)
```

```{r}
write.csv(targets, file = "./E-MTAB-3929_targets.csv")
```
